UVA Problems

What is the Median?


	
#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iterator>



using namespace std;



int main(){



long n; 
vector<long> vec;
vector<long>::iterator it;

bool first = true;
while(cin >> n){
	if(first){
		vec.push_back(n);
		first = false;
	} else {	
		it = upper_bound(vec.begin(), vec.end(), n);
		vec.insert(it, n);
	}	

	int n = vec.size();
	int med = n/2;

	if(n % 2 == 1){
		cout << vec[med] << endl;
	} else {
		cout << (vec[med-1] + vec[med])/2 << endl;

	}
	

}

return 0;  }
